p:
To isolate the effects of soil moisture on changes in NBP, an approach from Friedlingstein
35 is adapted for use ( Equation 1). Here, each term is expressed as their corresponding influence on NBP (Δ NBP ( LAND) ), where Δ NBP ( SMVAR) is the change in NBP due to soil moisture variability, Δ NBP ( SMTREND) is due to a change in mean soil moisture state, and Δ NBP ( OTHER) is due to CO 2 fertilization and changes in temperature. The term ∈ accounts for all other limiting and contributing factors to NBP.
